## [[Knitting](https://kbroman.org/knitr_knutshell/) [Kables](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/kableExtra/vignettes/awesome_table_in_html.html#Overview)]{.knitting .bigger}  

:::{.panel-tabset}

### `knitr::kable`

```{r}
#| label: tbl-mtcars
#| tbl-cap: mtcars vars (trunc)
#| echo: fenced
#| output-location: column

knitr::kable(
  mtcars[1:3, 1:2],
    col.names=c("MPG",   #<1>
                "CYL",
                "DISP")  #<1>
  )
```
1. Duplicate of actual object names (only changed capitalization) just to highlight useful `col.names` parameter

### `kableExtra::kbl`


```{r}
#| label: tbl-teeth
#| tbl-cap: ToothGrowth vars (trunc)
#| echo: fenced
#| output-location: column

library(kableExtra)

kbl(                  #<1>
  ToothGrowth[29:31, ]) %>%
  kable_classic() %>%
  row_spec(2, background="#bada55") %>%
  add_header_above(c(" "=1,
                     "Three Vars:"=3))
  
```
1. Souped up `knitr::kable` intended to better fit with `kableExtra`'s piping
